page.title: 15A Day With a Fisherman cntd
page.content: At 2.40pm the trawl was brought in for the last time,we then headed back towards Seaton to go crab potting. The trawl had caught Plaice,Whiting,Dog Fish,Dover Sole,Skate,crabs,squids, lobsters and Stinkers. At 3.45pm we reached the first crab pot and for the next two hours we gathered up 30 crab pots from the sea out of which he took 27 crabs but he put about 40 crabs back into the sea because they were too small or too soft. The crabs Mr.Ziemann keeps are exported to France and Spain, the fish he catches are sold in Seaton. Mr.Ziemann has been a fisherman for about 8 years and fishes 12 hours a day most of the year. We got back into harbour at Axmouth very wet and tired at 6.45pm after a very enjoyable day which we will never forget.
